results.title: Role of Nrf2 and protective effects of Metformin against tobacco smoke-induced cerebrovascular toxicity
results.text_hl: Herein we provide evidence of the role played by nuclear factor erythroid 2-related factor (@GENE_NFE2L2 @GENE_4780 @@@Nrf2@@@) in @<m>DISEASE_Smoke_Inhalation_Injury</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015208 @@@CS@@@-induced cerebrobvascular/BBB impairments and how these cerebrovascular harmful effects can be circumvented by the use of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ (MF; a widely prescribed, firstline anti-@DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetic@@@ drug) treatment.

citations.NLM: Prasad S, Sajja RK, Kaisar MA, Park JH, Villalba H, Liles T, Abbruscato T, Cucullo L. Role of Nrf2 and protective effects of Metformin against tobacco smoke-induced cerebrovascular toxicity Redox Biol. 2017 Aug;12():58-69. PMID: 28212524
